🔎 Homicide Connects 🔍

Do you like true crime? Solving puzzles? Feeling like a detective?
Come and join our murder mystery game group: Homicide Connects! Each month there is different case with variety of interactive clues, interesting characters, and twisted stories that will have you at the edge of your seat!
Investigative each suspects and cracked the case to catch the killer. Join us and become the detective that you are born to be!

Are you up for the challenge?

With the 10th year anniversay of Mr & Mrs. Smith, the day is filled with joy until dinner time. Mrs. Smith falls to the ground after drinking her wine. Screams fill the air as Mr. Smith grabs the love of his life into his arms. He looks into her eyes and sees that she's gone.
What happen? What was in Mrs. Smith drink? Who could have wanted her dead? A tragic story that ends in murder and it's your job to figure out what happen. Find the clues, investagate the suspects, connect the dots, and untangle the case to find the truth.





Want solve more murders?
